title: Coding Time Log
description: A time log entry for coding activities

id.description: The unique id for this todo in UUID format

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user associated with the time log entry

startTime.description: The start time of the coding session (ISO 8601 format)

endTime.description: The end time of the coding session (ISO 8601 format)

description.description: A description of the coding activity

duration.description: The duration of the coding session in minutes
